Title: Relates to consolidation of the unified court system; and repeals sections 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 16, 34, 35, 36, 36-a, 36-c, and 37 and subdivision j of section 22 of article 6 of the constitution relating there
Summary: Relates to consolidation of the unified court system.
LawCode: Rpld Art 6 §§9 - 14, 16, 34 - 36-a, 36-c & 37, §22 sub j, ren Art 6 §§15 & 17 - 33 to be §§9, 11 - 26 & 28, amd Constn, generally
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing amendments to article 6 of the constitution, in relation to consolidation of the unified court system, and the repeal of sections 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 16, subdivision j of section 22 and sections 34, 35, 36, 36-a, 36-c and 37 of article 6 of the constitution relating thereto
